from math import ceil
for _ in range(int(input())):
    (n, k) = map(int, input().split())
    ans = 0
    a = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    a = [0] + a
    for i in range(n):
        ans += ceil((a[i + 1] - a[i]) / k) - 1
    print(ans)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    (N, K) = map(int, input().split())
    H = list(map(int, input().split()))
    H = [0] + H
    ans = 0
    for i in range(N):
        ans += (H[i + 1] - H[i] - 1) // K
    print(ans)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    (N, K) = map(int, input().split())
    h = list(map(int, input().split()))
    h.insert(0, 0)
    c = 0
    for i in range(1, N + 1):
        c += (h[i] - h[i - 1] - 1) // K
    print(c)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    (N, K) = map(int, input().split())
    h = list(map(int, input().split()))
    h.insert(0, 0)
    c = 0
    for i in range(1, N + 1):
        c += (h[i] - h[i - 1] - 1) // K
    print(c)

t = int(input())
while t != 0:
    (n, k) = map(int, input().split())
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    c = 0
    p = 0
    for j in range(n):
        if l[j] - p > k:
            c += (l[j] - p) // k
            if (l[j] - p) % k == 0:
                c -= 1
        p = l[j]
    print(c)
    t -= 1

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    x = input().split()
    n = int(x[0])
    k = int(x[1])
    heights = [int(h) for h in input().split()]
    h_f = 0
    steps = 0
    for j in range(n):
        if heights[j] - h_f > k:
            steps = steps + (heights[j] - h_f - 1) // k
        h_f = heights[j]
    print(steps)

t = input()
for c in range(0, int(t)):
    a = input().split()
    n = int(a[0])
    k = int(a[1])
    p = 0
    s = 0
    for x in input().split():
        b = int(x) - p
        if b % k == 0:
            s += b / k - 1
        else:
            s += int(b / k)
        p = int(x)
    print(int(s))

t = int(input())
while t != 0:
    (n, k) = map(int, input().split())
    h = list(map(int, input().split()))[:n]
    ans = 0
    prev = 0
    for i in range(n):
        if h[i] - prev > k:
            p = h[i] - prev - 1
            ans += p // k
        prev = h[i]
    print(ans)
    t -= 1

t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    (n, k) = map(int, input().split())
    heights = list(map(int, input().split()))
    length = len(heights)
    prev = 0
    noOfSteps = 0
    for i in range(length):
        difference = heights[i] - prev
        if difference % k == 0:
            noOfSteps += difference // k - 1
        else:
            noOfSteps += difference // k
        prev = heights[i]
    print(noOfSteps)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    (n, k) = map(int, input().split())
    a = [0] + list(map(int, input().split()))
    print(sum([(a[i + 1] - a[i] - 1) // k for i in range(n)]))

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    (n, k) = map(int, input().split())
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    s = 0
    c = 0
    for j in l:
        if j - s > k:
            c += (j - s - 1) // k
        s = j
    print(c)

t = int(input())
while t:
    t -= 1
    (n, k) = map(int, input().split())
    l = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
    l.insert(0, 0)
    c = 0
    for i in range(1, n + 1):
        if l[i] - l[i - 1] > k:
            c += (l[i] - l[i - 1] - 1) // k
    print(c)
